StringTable.Label: ColonialGovernmentTier_Desc
StringTable.String:
Colonial Government [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Colonial governments are the base government for starfaring civilizations. They don't apply any specific bonuses or penalties.
To reform your government use the Call Election Executive Order.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ImperialGovernmentTier_Desc
StringTable.String:
Imperial Government [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Imperial governments are the first step in building an efficient government for a galactic empire.[/COLOR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Policy Slot +10% Manufacturing +25% Ship Range +3 Expectations for all Citizens
To reform your government use the Call Election Executive Order.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: RepublicGovernmentTier_Desc
StringTable.String:
Republic Government [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Republic governments improve efficiency by making use of local resources for maintenance and logistics.[/COLOR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Policy Slots +20% Manufacturing +20% Income +10 Logistics +50% Ship Range +6 Expectations for all Citizens
To reform your government use the Call Election Executive Order.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FederationGovernmentTier_Desc
StringTable.String: Federation Government [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Republic governments improve efficiency by making use of local resources for maintenance and logistics.[/COLOR] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+3 Policy Slots +30% Manufacturing +30% Income +30% Influence +20 Logistics +100% Ship Range +9 Expectations for all Citizens[/COLOR]
